verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse:
Your love has ravished my heart
And taken me over, taken me over
And all I want is to be
With You forever, with You forever

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Pull me a little closer take me a little deeper
I want to know Your heart i want to know Your heart
'Cause Your love is so much sweeter than anything I've tasted
I want to know Your heart i want to know Your heart

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
Whoa, whoa, how great Your love is for me
Whoa, whoa, how great is Your love
